feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING IN EFFECT, Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:26 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 16.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 16.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 13.6°C
Wind: NNW 31 km/h gust 70 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High 21. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low 13.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
